testcase.description:
Wired Performance Test
DUT: AP1130 AP350
Case Type: L2VPN Client to Server
IXIA Port 2 IXIA Port 3

step.desc: handle job variables and default values
step.multi-setvar: if [ "${chassis}" == "" ]; then echo "chassis=${chassis.def}"; else echo "chassis=${chassis}"; fi if [ "${tclServer}" == "" ]; then echo "tclServer=${tclServer.def}"; else echo "tclServer=${tclServer}"; fi if [ "${tclPort}" == "" ]; then echo "tclPort=${tclPort.def}"; else echo "tclPort=${tclPort}"; fi if [ "${ixiaPort2}" == "" ]; then echo "txPort=${txPort.def}"; else echo "txPort=${ixiaPort2}"; fi if [ "${ixiaPort1}" == "" ]; then echo "rxPort=${rxPort.def}"; else echo "rxPort=${ixiaPort1}"; fi if [ "${frameSizeList}" == "" ]; then echo "frameSizeList=${frameSizeList.def}"; else echo "frameSizeList=${frameSizeList}"; fi if [ "${trials}" == "" ]; then echo "trials=${trials.def}"; else echo "trials=${trials}"; fi if [ "${duration}" == "" ]; then echo "duration=${duration.def}"; else echo "duration=${duration}"; fi if [ "${initialRate}" == "" ]; then echo "initialRate=${initialRate.def}"; else echo "initialRate=${initialRate}"; fi if [ "${minRate}" == "" ]; then echo "minRate=${minRate.def}"; else echo "minRate=${minRate}"; fi if [ "${maxRate}" == "" ]; then echo "maxRate=${maxRate.def}"; else echo "maxRate=${maxRate}"; fi if [ "${resolution}" == "" ]; then echo "resolution=${resolution.def}"; else echo "resolution=${resolution}"; fi if [ "${tolerance}" == "" ]; then echo "tolerance=${tolerance.def}"; else echo "tolerance=${tolerance}"; fi if [ "${srcIP}" == "" ]; then echo "srcIP=${srcIP.def}"; else echo "srcIP=${srcIP}"; fi if [ "${srcGateway}" == "" ]; then echo "srcGateway=${srcGateway.def}"; else echo "srcGateway=${srcGateway}"; fi if [ "${dstIP}" == "" ]; then echo "dstIP=${dstIP.def}"; else echo "dstIP=${dstIP}"; fi if [ "${dstGateway}" == "" ]; then echo "dstGateway=${dstGateway.def}"; else echo "dstGateway=${dstGateway}"; fi

step.desc: config DUT AP1130 as VPN server
step.console: -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "interface mgt0 ip 172.21.2.1 255.255.255.0" -v "ip route net 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 gateway 172.21.2.2" -v "user-profile 1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 1 attribute 1" -v "user-profile 1 tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy" -v "vpn xauth-client-list client_list local" -v "vpn xauth-client-list client_list client-name xdchen password aerohive" -v "vpn client-ip-pool ip_pool local 172.31.3.1 172.31.3.10 netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "vpn server-ipsec-tunnel server_ipsec" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel server_ipsec client-list client_list client-ip-pool ip_pool dns-server 192.168.0.1" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel server_ipsec ike phase1 auth-method psk" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel server_ipsec ike phase1 psk aerohive" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel server_ipsec ike phase1 lifetime 10000000" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel server_ipsec ike phase2 lifetime 10000000" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel server_ipsec local-ike-id address 172.21.2.1" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel server_ipsec dpd idle-interval 0 retry 65535 retry-interval 60" -v "amrp vpn-tunnel heartbeat interval 0 retry 10" -v "vpn tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy server ipsec-tunnel server_ipsec"

step.desc: config DUT2 AP350-2 as VPN Client
step.console: -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning idle-timeout 3600" -v "interface mgt0 ip 172.21.2.2 255.255.255.0" -v "ip route net 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 gateway 172.21.2.1" -v "user-profile 1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 1 attribute 1" -v "user-profile 1 tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy" -v "vpn client-ipsec-tunnel client_ipsec" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel client_ipsec gateway 172.21.2.1 client-name xdchen password aerohive" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel client_ipsec ike phase1 auth-method psk" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel client_ipsec ike phase1 psk aerohive" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel client_ipsec ike phase1 lifetime 10000000" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel client_ipsec ike phase2 lifetime 10000000" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel client_ipsec dpd idle-interval 0 retry 65535 retry-interval 60" -v "amrp vpn-tunnel heartbeat interval 0 retry 10" -v "vpn tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy client ipsec-tunnel client_ipsec primary"
-v "no interface eth1/13 shutdown" -v "no interface eth1/6 shutdown" -v "no interface eth1/21 shutdown"
-v "vlan 2" -v "interface eth1/12 switchport access vlan 2" -v "interface eth1/22 switchport access vlan 2" -v "no interface eth1/12 shutdown" -v "no interface eth1/22 shutdown"

step.desc: copy result from tclServer to mpc
step.script: staf ${tclServer} fs copy file "${quicktest.result.path}" \ tofile "${log.dir}/${log.file}" tomachine ${mpc.mif.ip}

step.desc: show debug info on VPN server
step.console: -v "show interface" -v "show vpn ike event" -v "show log buffered | include err"

step.desc: show debug info on VPN client
step.console: -v "show interface" -v "show vpn ike event" -v "show log buffered | include err"

step.desc: release all ixia ports connected by ixNetwork TCL Server
